markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Uvuko (The Diamond Ring)](/Deities.aspx?ID=228)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The god Uvuko dances across the land, his body forming the boundary between earth and sky. His twisting tail churns the air into clouds, his creations spreading water to all those who thirst. His sliding scales till the earth, bringing forth plants that are nourished by Uvuko's rains. The worship of Uvuko is widespread in the Mwangi Expanse, found among many [lizardfolk](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=15) tribes, Mbe'ke and Taralu [dwarves](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=1), and in the more cosmopolitan cities.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** embrace change and the future, master adversity with flexibility, foster freedom and progress for others

**Anathema** allow yourself and your surroundings to stagnate, crush an egg, use vile or cruel language

**Area of Concern**
metamorphosis, cycles, growth, fertility 

**Follower Alignments**
NG, N, CG, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Maul](/Weapons.aspx?ID=33)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=40), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15), [Wyrmkin](/Domains.aspx?ID=57)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=2), [Cold](/Domains.aspx?ID=41)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122)

- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147)

- **6th**
[Dragon Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=88)

</column>
name: Uvuko (The Diamond Ring)
